articles.author: Sian Cain
articles.title: Taylor Swift becomes first woman to have four albums in US Top 10 at once - The Guardian
articles.description: Singer is just third artist in history to have four albums in top 10 concurrently, with Speak Now (Taylor’s Version) becoming her 12th album to reach No. 1
articles.content: Taylor Swift has become the first woman, and only the third artist ever, to have four albums in the Top 10 of the US album chart simultaneously, while also beating a record set by Barbra Streisand to… [+1211 chars]

articles.title: Christopher Nolan will “absolutely” not work on more films until strikes end - NME
articles.description: Christopher Nolan has confirmed that he will “absolutely” not be working on more films until after the Hollywood strikes end.
articles.content:
